title: What are the red bottoms that Ariana Grande sings of? - Quora

response.answer_text: Red bottoms are a type of heel in which the bottoms of them are red.   In Ariana Grande's 7 Rings, she says Whoever said money can't solve your problems Must not have had enough money to solve 'em They say, "Which one?" I say, "Nah, I want all of 'em" Happiness is the same price as red-bottoms She is saying that happiness can be bought and a pair of red bottom heels will surely buy her happiness.
